statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractionData;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractionData WHERE churn_prediction = TRUE;
SELECT interaction_type, interaction_details FROM CustomerInteractionData WHERE interaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractionData ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type FROM CustomerInteractionData WHERE churn_prediction = FALSE ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractionData ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_details FROM CustomerInteractionData WHERE churn_prediction = TRUE
SELECT * FROM CustomerInteractionData WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint' AND interaction_details LIKE '%refund%'
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM CustomerInteractionData WHERE interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT AVG(churn_prediction) AS average_churn_rate FROM CustomerInteractionData
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions
SELECT customer_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_id > 10
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions ORDER BY interaction_date DESC
SELECT prediction_id, customer_id, churn_probability FROM churn_predictions WHERE churn_probability > 0.6
SELECT prediction_id, prediction_date FROM churn_predictions ORDER BY prediction_date ASC
SELECT * FROM customer_interactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'complaint' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_id, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customer_interactions WHERE interaction_type IN ('comment','complaint') AND interaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(interaction_id) AS total_interactions FROM customer_interactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(interaction_id) > 10 ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;

SELECT c.customer_id, c.interaction_date, p.prediction_date, p.churn_probability FROM customer_interactions c INNER JOIN churn_predictions p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id ORDER BY p.churn_probability DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id;
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM churn_predictor WHERE accuracy > 0.8;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id WHERE interaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_name = 'John Doe' ORDER BY subscription_date DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_details FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Purchase' ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers WHERE subscription_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT model_name, accuracy FROM churn_predictor WHERE created_date >= '2021-06-01' ORDER BY accuracy DESC;

SELECT customer_name, subscription_date, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers c JOIN interactions i ON c.customer_id = i.customer_id WHERE c.customer_name LIKE 'S%' AND i.interaction_type = 'Feedback';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE signup_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, churn_reason FROM churn_reasons WHERE churn_reason LIKE '%unhappy%' ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM interactions WHERE interaction_type = 'Email' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, email, signup_date FROM customers WHERE signup_date < '2022-01-01' ORDER BY signup_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_name, predicted_churn FROM customers JOIN churn_predictions ON customers.customer_id = churn_predictions.customer_id WHERE churn_probability > 0.7;
SELECT interaction_type, COUNT(*) AS num_interactions FROM interactions GROUP BY interaction_type ORDER BY num_interactions DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, join_date FROM customers WHERE customer_id > 100 ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email, join_date FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_id, feedback_date, sentiment_score FROM feedback ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT * FROM churn_predictions WHERE churn_probability > 0.5;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date, sentiment_score FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id;
SELECT payment_date, amount FROM payments WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY payment_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, interaction_type, interaction_date FROM customers JOIN interactions ON customers.customer_id = interactions.customer_id ORDER BY interaction_date ASC;
